keyMoments.title: Discovers Water Weakens Kalifa's Powers
keyMoments.description: Nami realizes that water washes away Kalifa's soap bubbles, discovering the weakness of the Awa Awa no Mi Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery is the turning point that allows Nami to formulate a winning strategy against a physically superior CP9 agent.
keyMoments.quote: Water! That's it! Water washes away the soap!

keyMoments.title: Cool Charge Debut
keyMoments.description: Nami uses Cool Charge for the first time, creating a Cool Ball on her Perfect Clima-Tact to set up advanced techniques.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this technique which becomes a key component of Nami's upgraded arsenal.

keyMoments.title: Mirage Tempo: Fata Morgana Debut
keyMoments.description: Nami creates five mirage versions of herself with different body types, completely confounding Kalifa and showcasing her mastery of meteorological phenomena.
keyMoments.significance: One of Nami's most iconic and visually spectacular techniques, demonstrating her growth as a combatant.

abilities.description: Nami creates a Cool Ball on her Perfect Clima-Tact, manipulating temperature to set up advanced weather techniques.
An advanced mirage technique that creates five visual illusions of Nami with different body types, all moving in perfect unison.

keyMoments.title: Shinaru Shigan 'Whip' Debut
keyMoments.description: Kalifa demonstrates a variation of the Shigan Rokushiki technique, using a flexible, whip-like motion to extend her finger strike's range.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kalifa's mastery of Rokushiki techniques and her ability to adapt them to her fighting style.

keyMoments.title: Water Weakness Revealed
keyMoments.description: Nami discovers that water washes away Kalifa's soap bubbles, revealing the fundamental weakness of her Awa Awa no Mi powers.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery leads to Kalifa's eventual defeat and shows that even powerful Devil Fruit abilities have exploitable weaknesses.

abilities.description: A variation of the Rokushiki technique Shigan that uses a flexible, whip-like finger thrust with extended range.

reveals.information: Water washes away her Awa Awa no Mi soap bubbles, neutralizing the weakening effects

keyMoments.title: Continues Battle with Rob Lucci
keyMoments.description: Luffy battles Rob Lucci in his leopard hybrid form, struggling against Lucci's overwhelming power and speed as he tries to reach Robin.
keyMoments.significance: The main battle of the Enies Lobby arc continues, representing the clash between freedom and the World Government's control.
keyMoments.quote: I won't let you get to Robin!

keyMoments.title: Kicks Luffy Away from Door
keyMoments.description: Lucci counters Luffy's attempt to reach the door leading to Robin, kicking him away with overwhelming force.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Lucci's role as the final obstacle between Luffy and Robin, and his cold efficiency as a guardian of World Government interests.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Monster Point Rampage Through Tower
keyMoments.description: Chopper, in his uncontrollable Monster Point form, crashes through the Tower of Justice rooms, inadvertently helping Nami during her battle with Kalifa.
keyMoments.significance: Chopper's rampage creates the circumstances that allow Nami to discover Kalifa's weakness, showing how the Straw Hats' battles interconnect.

keyMoments.title: Uses Makie with Sogeking
keyMoments.description: Zoro and Sogeking execute a defensive technique called Makie to deflect simultaneous attacks from Kaku and Jabra.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Straw Hats' ability to work together and adapt to team-based combat situations.

keyMoments.title: Uses Makie with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Sogeking and Zoro execute a defensive technique called Makie to deflect simultaneous attacks from Kaku and Jabra.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sogeking's ability to coordinate with Zoro despite their contrasting fighting styles.
